sentences.sContent: Seed your tears deep in your heart it will grow up to valorous flowers.
sentences.sContent_eng: Seed your tears deep in your heart it will grow up to valorous flowers.
sentences.sCn: 把眼泪种在心里，会开出勇敢的花朵。

sentences.sContent: "Her passengers, the other hostages, will never forget her calm, confident, valorous work" (William W. Bradley).
sentences.sContent_eng: "Her passengers, the other hostages, will never forget her calm, confident, valorous work" (William W. Bradley).
sentences.sCn: “她的乘客，其他人质，永远不会忘记她冷静的、自信的、勇敢的举动” （威廉·W·布拉德利）。

sentences.sContent: Griffin - Sets forth the property of a valorous soldier whose magnanimity is such that he will dare all dangers, and even death itself, rather than become captive.
sentences.sContent_eng: Griffin - Sets forth the property of a valorous soldier whose magnanimity is such that he will dare all dangers, and even death itself, rather than become captive.
sentences.sCn: 狮鹫-出征的勇士以其无畏的精神敢于对抗一切危险，宁愿阵亡也决不被生俘。

remMethod.val: val(强大) + orous → 勇敢使人强大 → 勇敢的
